ygData.subject: Re: I know...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree, I m in a guild with some reasonably high level members (well high 20s low 30s) and they laughed at me when I asked them to go to solusek to look
ygData.messageBody:
> I would be very upset if that "third book" resided in an area that made it
> difficult, if not impossible, for tinkers below level 35 to attain.
>
> Phenglei of Erollisi Marr

I agree, I'm in a guild with some reasonably high level members (well high
20s low 30s) and they laughed at me when I asked them to go to solusek to
look for tinkering info for me. :) They said they heard that lvl 50s run
around there like newbies. hehe Well I'm only lvl 18 so I won't be
exploring that area anytime soon.
